text: Convicted is a 1950 American crime film noir drama directed by Henry Levin and is the third adaption film the 1929 play The Criminal Code by Martin Flavin. It stars Glenn Ford, Broderick Crawford, Millard Mitchell, Dorothy Malone, Carl Benton Reid, Ed Begley, Douglas Kennedy, Martha Stewart, Frank Faylen and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Henry Levin Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in prison
title: Convicted (1950 movie)
